text: Baptiste Planckaert (born 28 September 1988 in Kortrijk) is a Belgian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . In May 2018, he was named in the startlist for the Giro d'Italia, where he finished 116th overall. For the 2021 season, Planckaert will join the team on a one-year contract. ==Personal life== Planckaert, along with his brothers Edward Planckaert and Emiel Planckaert, are all professional cyclists.
